Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Lock
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Increased Wait Times on Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red Line service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platforms. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platforms.

Crews are working to accommodate all passengers and restore normal service as quickly as is possible.
